ComicInfo.Summary: The end is NIGH! Space Godzilla and other interstellar enemies arrive on Earth and they're here to stay... and destroy humanity! Boxer, with his team decimated, realizes just how over his head he is. There's only one possible ally he can turn to... his greatest enemy, Godzilla!
ComicInfo.Tags: Dr. Pohl,United States Army,Monster Kill Crew,SpaceGodzilla,Mothra,Hedorah,Harrison,Asuka,Gigan,Titanosaurus,Boxer,Godzilla,King Ghidorah,Kumonga,Anguirus
ComicInfo.Title: Part 9: The Night the Giant Monsters Came Home
